Welcome back!
Posted by Jarvis on 04-16-2003 10:31 PM - 2 comments [read]
Brells blessing, the site is back on a new, stable host! Sadly the website went down without warning March 31st due to reasons unrelated to eqcleric.com. It seems hard to find a good webhost these days without paying an arm and a leg. Especially if you're pushing a great deal of traffic, and eqcleric.com is already moving quite a bit.

Now that the site is back on we're going to spend a few days ironing out bugs from moving the website. There's always something not right when you change the entire environment the site lives on. So don't hesitate to send me a PM if you find a problem with the website.

Donators, please read
This site exists today thanks to those who have been generous enough to donate to eqcleric.com. We thank you for that, and we would like to give you a little extra attention. If you're registered with these boards and you have donated to the website, please send me a PM or E-mail with the following information:

  • The PayPal Transaction ID (located in your confirmation email)
  • The E-mail address donation was sent from
  • Your eqcleric.com Forum Username

    That way we can tack your account with a "Site Supporter" graphic that will appear in your profile and on all posts you make on this website. This is a little courtesy we would like to extend to you as a thank you for supporting the website and helping it stay online.

    Now that the site is back online we can start working on features for the website. We hope to have spells, quests and guides available in the near future.

    We're glad to be back!
    		•

    LoY Cleric Spells
    Posted by Jarvis on 02-22-2003 01:16 AM - 10 comments [read]
    So in a few days Clerics who purchase the Legacy of Ykesha addon can enjoy 2 new cleric spells:

    Temperance


    Level:44
    Target:Single
    Range:100
    Cast Time:9 seconds
    Recast Time:2.25 seconds
    Duration:100 minutes
    Mana Cost:550
    Reagent:Peridot x 1

    Effect:

  • +800 to maximum hit points
  • 800 points of healing
  • +53 armor class

    • Pure Blood



    Level:51
    Target:Single
    Range:100
    Cast Time:2.5 seconds
    Recast Time:2.25 seconds
    Duration:Instant
    Mana Cost:100

    Effect:

  • Remove 18 Poison counters
  • Remove 18 Disease counters

    Legacy of Ykesha
    Posted by Cerrick on 02-12-2003 04:03 AM - no comments [read]
    The newest downloadable expansion for Everquest: Legacy of Ykesha is soon to become available for play.

    The sony EQ website resleased information on this new feature today. Looks like a powerful tool for creating maps.
    Check it out following the link below!

    Legacy of Ykesha follows very closely to the release of Planes of Power, yet offers content aimed at the 35-60 level playes, and some changes that effect all of Norrath. Here are some of the Highlights of LoY and links to the EQ website you you can check them out yourself!

    • New Playable Race: Froglocks
    • Expanded Bank Capacity
    • Enhanced Looking for Group Tool
    • NPC Conversation Journal
    • Customized Armor Dyes
    • Guild Management Tool
    • New Item Slot: Charms Sweet
    • New Zones
    • Cartography System
    • Dozens of New Creatures
    • New Spells TBA:Feb 21st
    read 128 times - make a comment  

    The Legacy of Ykesha
    Posted by Jarvis on 01-15-2003 07:29 PM - 7 comments [read]
    So, a new expansion to EQ has been announced today, The Legacy of Ykesha.

    Seems it's coming pretty soon too. Doesn't look to be as big of an expansion as Planes of Power was, which is good. I'm sure most of us have yet to utilize PoP fully. Februrary 24th 2003 is the expected "live" date. Not too bad. I must say I'm pretty excited about some of these features:

  • New Playable Race: Frogloks
  • Enhanced Looking for Group tool
  • Guild Management tool
  • Cartography system
  • New magic item slot: Charms
  • Armor dye
  • New creatures
  • Expanded bank capacity
  • New zones
  • New spells

    Of course I have to admit, I'm sure SoE could have implemented most of these features without releasing a new addon. (Look at the release of the bazaar and the new UI for instance). Official website is http://www.legacyofykesha.com/. What do you think about these features, and what do you think "Cartography System" really means?

    Another interesting fact is that this is going to be the first downloadable-only expansion to EQ. I hope they got some serious server power ready to handle the requests.

    Make sure you preorder it before the release date to get it at a "special" $17.99 price. After it goes live the price jumps to $21.99. (Might change)
    		•

    Back up and running
    Posted by Nandiyan on 01-09-2003 03:18 AM - 16 comments [read]
    Welcome back to eqcleric.com - this time we're not going away that easily.

    We have some exciting plans for the site, but both Jarvis and I decided it was more important to get the old site up and running again as fast as possible. Once it settles in on the new server, I will start working on improvements and new features. They will not come overnight, though. Unfortunately I have other things that need attention too, but bit by bit, we will get there.

    Enjoy your stay.
    -Nandiyan
